channel.title: Question about RichScape
channel.description:
I downloaded RichScape, and I was so excited to edit it, unfortunately.. I tried doing the commands but they don't work. I tried changing the commands like so;
static void customCommand(Client c, String cmd) {
to
public void customCommand(String command) {
And all other stuff, but it just gave me a bunch of errors. Any help please? Thanks.

item.title: Question about RichScape
item.dc:creator: @flipmc flipmc
item.description:
@flipmc wrote:

But it doesn’t work?
I can’t even do one single command…

Edit: Nevermind, got it to work.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about RichScape
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Usually voids are already Declared PUBLIC, So you don’t need to edit them, And why would you want to edit the Static bit, If it’s like that, leave it.

Read full topic
